titles.title: Adult Education WORKS Act
Adult Education Workforce Opportunity and Reskilling for Knowledge and Success Act
Adult Education WORKS Act
A bill to amend the Adult Education and Family Literacy Act and the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to strengthen adult education.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Adult Education Workforce Opportunity and Reskilling for Knowledge and Success Act or the Adult Education WORKS Act
This bill expands adult education and literacy activities provided through state and local workforce development programs.
